fullText:
Storm Manifested

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Genasi, warden, promise of storm power
Benefit: Whenever you hit with an attack benefiting from your promise of storm power, you slide each enemy marked by you 1 square as a free action and those enemies are slowed until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 62.
name: Storm Manifested
